cleaned_text: Medical Detoxification A cleanse is vital because people are exposed to toxins in the home, office and environment. Chemotherapy and radiation also leave toxins in the body and need to be eliminated. A detox will cleanse the cells, organs and blood, while boosting the immune system. We also will replenish key vitamins and minerals as part of your medical detoxification. Vitamin & Mineral Replenishment Therapy (VMRT) Clinical studies indicate that vitamin and mineral deficiencies cause DNA damage leading to cancer. We provide vitamin and mineral replenishment therapy (VMRT) to nurture healthy cells, boost the immune system and further detoxify the body. We administer intravenous solutions containing isotonic saline, potassium chloride, calcium gluconate, magnesium sulfate, copper sulfate and MVI containing ascorbic acid, vitamin A, vitamin D, thiamine, riboflavin, pyridoxine, niacinamide, dexpanthenol, vitamin E, vitamin and vitamin B12. Benefits - Rehydrates and detoxifies. Protects DNA from mutation. - Improves bodily functions. Boosts immune system. Coffee Enemas Coffee enemas are a classic alternative medicine detox procedure made prevalent by Dr. Max Gerson. He found that coffee enemas stimulate the flow of bile from the liver and gallbladder. Coffee enemas may also increase the production of the antioxidant glutathione. Benefits - Relieves constipation. Boosts immunity. - Stimulates organs to detox. Increases energy.
